channel.title: [317][PI-DELTA] Giving Anyone Rights to a Command
channel.description:
Giving A Player Rigts to a command like ::pickup ::object ::npc ::interface...
Changing "Client.Java"
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Shearch For ur command, that you added allready
[code]("[Command]")[/code]
Copy This:
[code]&& playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("[PLAYER'S NAME HERE]")) {[/code]
Paste the code after this:
[code]if(command.startsWith("[Command]") && playerRights > 2[/code]
Needs To look like this:
[code] if(command.startsWith("[Command]") && playerRights > 2 && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("[PLAYER'S NAME HERE]")){ [/code]
Enjoy. If haveing any problems Post them down here...
